snippet: Amazon is aggressively buying electronics as well as selling them, giving a post-holiday push to its electronics trade-in store. The process is simple for the consumer -- complete a Web form, box the device up and mail it off. What happens at Amazon...
abstract: Amazon is aggressively buying electronics as well as selling them, giving a post-holiday push to its electronics trade-in store. The process is simple for the consumer -- complete a Web form, box the device up and mail it off. What happens at Amazon is a little murkier.
lead_paragraph: For a couple of months now, Amazon has practically begged you to buy a Kindle Fire. Maybe you did. And maybe you are insanely happy that you can now spend hours on the couch playing Angry Birds rather than reading some boring old book, which is all you could do on your old Kindle.

headline.main: Amazon Kindles: Easy Come, Easy Go
